|brand = Acer |model = WLAN-G-PC2 |submodelappend = <!-- yes for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |sernum = <!-- Serial number prefix --> |wlclass = G54 |series = <!-- Device series --> |if = PCMCIA (32-bit) |if_bus_version = <!-- ie. 1.0, 1.1, 2.0, 2.2 --> |ifconnector = <!-- Interface Connector Type, Leave blank for none --> |formfactor = <!-- Connector Form Factor, Leave blank for none -->
|vendor_id = 17fe |device_id = 2220 |subvendor_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subdevice_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |id_string = <!-- PnP ID string --> |windosid = <!-- Windows ID, Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = MAA-PW8610IM |icid = <!-- Industry Canada ID, Leave blank for none --> |boardid = <!-- Board ID --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id --> |oui = 00:30:95
|chip1 = Inprocomm;IPN2220; |chip2 = Maxim;MAX2825; |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|antconn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |antenna = <!-- Antenna type --> |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11b/g |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |wififreq = 2.4 |receive_sens = <!-- Receive sensitivity --> |transmit_power = <!-- Transmit power -->
|linuxdriv = |windriv =
|is_manuf = No |manuf = Procomp |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |flags = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |802dot11_protocols = bg |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category =
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 2004 |price = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |country = Taiwan
|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device -->
}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== These cards have a '''Procomp''' OUI, which would seem to indicate their manufacture. :They look somewhat like '''Alpha Networks''' cards from the same era, however.
The chipset is not known and these cards bare no FCC ID. :It's probably a [[Procomp PW8610IM]].
*[https://wiki.ubuntuusers.de/WLAN/Karten/Acer/ ''Acer WLAN-G-PC2'' on '''UbuntuUsers''' wiki] (DE) :WLAN 11g PCMCIA Card (WLAN-G-PC2) :PCMCIA: 17fe:2220 (WEP, WPA, WPA2) :Linksys/AirConn - [[Inprocomm]] IPN2220
==See also== *[[Acer WLAN-G-PC2]] *[[Acer WLAN-G-US1]] *[[Acer WLAN 11b USB Dongle]] :USB ID: 0457:0162 ([[SiS]] 162U) *[[Acer UWA2]] - USB WiFi Adapter ([[CC&C WL-6210-V3]]) :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/HLZUWA2 HLZUWA2] (2013-04-19) *[[Acer UWA3]] - USB Wireless Adapter :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/HLZUWA3 HLZUWA3] (2014-07-18) *[[Acer ADR131]] - Wireless Display Dongle :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/HLZADR131 HLZADR131] (2013-05-09) *[[Acer AM100]] - Air Monitor :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/HLZAM100 HLZAM100] (2017-03-21) *[[Acer QCNFA344A]] - 802.11abgn/ac + BT4.1 M.2 2230 Type Card :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/HLZ344A HLZ344A] (2017-08-10) - [[QCA]] [[Qualcomm Atheros QCNFA344A|QCNFA344A]] (NGFF) *[[Acer T77H389]] - Dual Band WiFi LGA Module ([[Foxconn T77H389]]) :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/HLZ-T77H389 HLZ-T77H389] (2012-09-27) *[[Acer MPCI-101]] - Wireless LAN Module :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/HLZMPCI-101 HLZMPCI-101] (2006-05-02)
